definition: A social gathering organized by individuals residing in close proximity to one another, typically held in a residential area. It serves as an opportunity for neighbors to interact, socialize, and foster a sense of community.

examples.german: Die Nachbarschaftsparty war ein großer Erfolg.
examples.english: The neighborhood party was a great success.

examples.german: Jeder brachte etwas zu essen zur Nachbarschaftsparty mit.
examples.english: Everyone brought some food to the neighborhood party.

examples.german: Die Nachbarschaftsparty fand im Garten statt.
examples.english: The neighborhood party took place in the garden.

examples.german: Die Nachbarschaftsparty dauerte bis spät in die Nacht.
examples.english: The neighborhood party lasted until late at night.
